original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1181)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1181)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4315)@</color> 秒內對範圍內的敵方武將每秒造成 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4315)@</color> 點傷害，若敵方武將在狀態時間內死亡則蛇毒就會爆發，且傳染給周遭的敵方武將。
text: <color=#FFE787> Reply time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1181)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(1181)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage on the enemy in the front range, and in <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4315)@</color> every second in <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4315)@</color> <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4315)@</color> Damage. If the enemy general dies within the status time, the snake venom will burst and spread to the surrounding enemy generals.
